message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $115, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $112.50?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I can meet you at $113, but that's as close to $112.50 as I can get. It's a fair price, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
I'm still a bit off on the price, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $111?
I'm starting to think we're close, Bob! I can do $112, but that's my final offer. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle.
I'm really close, but I think I can do $111.50. That's my final offer. If you can meet me there, I'll take the deal.
I've given you a good deal, Bob! I can do $111.75, but that's really as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
I'm sorry, but I think I've gone as low as I can. I'm not willing to go above $111. I'll have to walk away if you can't meet me there.
